EmailTemplate.name: EMS-Webinars_Paper-to-ePCR_Nov10.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary Live Webinar - Transitioning from Paper to Electronic Patient Care Reporting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Complimentary Live Webinar Transitioning from Paper to Electronic Patient Care Reporting
Join us for a complimentary live webinar on Transitioning from Paper to Electronic Patient Care Reporting.
This presentation will touch on the following aspects of transitioning from paper to electronic patient care reporting:
-Benefits -Project Scope -Equipment -Hardware -Software -Training -Budget -Results
DATE: November 10, 2011 TIME: 1 PM Central l 2 PM Eastern l Noon Mountain l 11 AM Pacific PRESENTER: Larry Cole -Former Director of Finance and Corporate Compliance, Kanawha County Ambulance -26 Years as Paramedic -10 Years as Director of Finance -Fusion ePCR Project Manager
REGISTER: http://offers.tritech.com/EMSWebinars_PapertoePCR_Nov10_Registration.html
Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communications Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121 | PH: 858.799.7000
